config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code retrieves the default font family from a map of hints. If the font family is not found in the hints map, it falls back to the superclass method to get the default font family.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the getDefaultFontFamily() method is called in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the DEFAULT_FONT_FAMILY configuration option is limited to the font family used in the system's UI components. Changing this configuration may affect the overall look and feel of the application.
